name: Sweet Pickles
author: In Memory of Ella I. Schlosser

ingredients.name: lb. cucumbers, peeled, seeded and cut into sticks

instructions: First day: place lime in 2 gallons of water with cucumber sticks. Soak for 24 hours. Second day: remove from lime water and wash through four waters. Then fix 1/4 pound of alum in 2 gallons of water and soak sticks for 12 hours. Third day: remove from alum water. Wash one time, soak in clear water for 6 hours. Drain. Make a syrup of vinegar, 1 quart water, sugar, and salt. Add spices. Boil and pour over cucumbers. Let stand 4 hours. Then place syrup over heat and boil until clear 30 - 35 minutes. Place sticks in jars and seal.
